data.title: Small Animal General Surgery Appointment Request Form – Veterinary Teaching Hospital
data.text:
Small Animal General Surgery Appointment Request Form

« back to service

To request an appointment, please complete the Appointment Request form below.

In addition to filling out the Appointment Request form, please provide veterinary records related to the current problem, including:

Blood work

X-rays

Reports from any advanced imaging including ultrasound, CT scan, and/or MRI

If you do not already have this information, you can request it from your veterinarian.

Please email your pet’s veterinary records to [email protected] as soon as possible prior to your appointment to allow us the chance to review the information provided. Include your pet’s name and your last name in the file name of anything you email.

"*" indicates required fields

Client Information

Client Name*

First Last

Address*

Street Address Address Line 2 City State ZIP Code

Email*

Main Phone Number You Can Be Reached at While Your Pet is at CSU*

Additional Phone Number

Pet Information

Pet Name

Species

Breed

Color

Sex*

Primary Veterinary Clinic Information*

Secondary Veterinary Clinic Information

Any other clinic you have taken your pet to be seen for this condition

Recent Veterinary Examinations

Has your pet been examined by another veterinarian within the last 3 months?*

Yes

No

Please list all veterinarians/veterinary clinics that have examined your pet in the last 3 months.*

What is the tentative diagnosis that has been established during those visits?

Please describe your pet’s problem, including how long it has been going on, the severity of the problem, etc.*

Have any diagnostics (e.g. x-rays, ultrasound, CT, MRI, etc.) been performed?*

Yes

No

Select the diagnostics that have already been performed to your pet’s current problem

None

Radiographs (x-rays)

CT Scan

Other

Clinic Name

Clinic Address

Street Address Address Line 2 City State / Province / Region ZIP / Postal Code Country

Clinic Phone

Previous Surgery

Has your pet had any previous surgeries?*

Yes

No

Please describe.*

Appointment Date Preference

Do you have a specific date preference for when this appointment is scheduled (no guarantee of appointment availability)?*

If we recommend surgery, when would you prefer to schedule the procedure?*

As close to the consultation appointment date as possible.

At a later date.

General Questions

How would you describe your pet's personality?*

Typically friendly with people and pets

Typically friendly with people, but not necessarily with other animals

Typically friendly with other animals, but not necessarily with other people

Not typically friendly with other people or animals

Scared of other people or animals

Anxious at veterinary visits

Other

Please list all medications (name, dose in mg, frequency) that your pet is currently receiving.*

Example: Rimadyl 75mg, once a day

Please list all other supplements, etc., that your pet is currently receiving (name, dose, frequency)*

Example: Dasuquin Large Breen Dog, 1 tablet once a day

What diet (brand name/quantity/frequency) is your pet currently receiving?*

Example: Purina J/M kibbles, 1 cup twice a day

What goals do you have for your pet?*

I want my pet to return to household activities such as playing in the yard or house

I want my dog to return to an active lifestyle such as hiking

I want my dog to return to recreational sport such as hunting or agility

I want my dog to return to work such as ranch work, SAR, etc.

Other

Does your pet have any allergies to food, medications, or something else?*

Yes

No

Please specify

Additional Information

Is there anything else that you would like to share with us prior to your appointment?

Phone

This field is for validation purposes and should be left unchanged.
